title: Spanish Preterite Tense
description: Test your knowledge of Spanish preterite tense verbs, including regular -ar, -er, -ir verbs and common irregular verbs.

questions.question: Translate to Spanish: 'I spoke with my friend yesterday'
questions.explanation: The preterite form of 'hablar' in first person singular is 'hablé'.

questions.question: Translate to Spanish: 'They ate at the restaurant'
questions.explanation: The preterite form of 'comer' in third person plural is 'comieron'.

questions.question: Translate to Spanish: 'She wrote a letter'
questions.explanation: The preterite form of 'escribir' in third person singular is 'escribió'.

questions.question: Translate to English: 'Yo fui al mercado'
options: I will go to the market
I am going to the market
questions.explanation: 'Fui' is the preterite form of 'ir' (to go) in first person singular.

questions.question: Translate to Spanish: 'We had a party'
questions.explanation: The preterite form of 'tener' in first person plural is 'tuvimos'.

questions.question: Translate to Spanish: 'You (formal) made dinner'
questions.explanation: The preterite form of 'hacer' in third person singular (formal you) is 'hizo'.

questions.question: Translate to English: 'Ellos estuvieron en la playa'
options: They will be at the beach
They have been at the beach
questions.explanation: 'Estuvieron' is the preterite form of 'estar' in third person plural.

questions.question: Translate to Spanish: 'I was sick last week'
questions.explanation: The preterite form of 'estar' in first person singular is 'estuve'.

questions.question: Translate to Spanish: 'You (informal) saw the movie'
questions.explanation: The preterite form of 'ver' in second person singular is 'viste'.

questions.question: Translate to English: 'Nosotros fuimos al cine'
options: We will go to the movies
We are going to the movies
questions.explanation: 'Fuimos' is the preterite form of 'ir' in first person plural.

questions.question: Translate to Spanish: 'They gave me a gift'
questions.explanation: The preterite form of 'dar' in third person plural is 'dieron'.

questions.question: Translate to Spanish: 'You (plural) came to the party'
questions.explanation: The preterite form of 'venir' in second person plural is 'vinieron'.

questions.question: Translate to English: 'Yo supe la verdad'
questions.explanation: 'Supe' is the preterite form of 'saber' in first person singular.

questions.question: Translate to Spanish: 'She put the book on the table'
options: Pone el libro en la mesa
Puso el libro en la mesa
Ponía el libro en la mesa
Pondrá el libro en la mesa
questions.explanation: The preterite form of 'poner' in third person singular is 'puso'.

questions.question: Translate to Spanish: 'We wanted to help'
questions.explanation: The preterite form of 'querer' in first person plural is 'quisimos'.

questions.question: Translate to English: 'Tú dijiste la verdad'
questions.explanation: 'Dijiste' is the preterite form of 'decir' in second person singular.

questions.question: Translate to Spanish: 'I could finish the work'
questions.explanation: The preterite form of 'poder' in first person singular is 'pude'.

questions.question: Translate to Spanish: 'They brought the food'
questions.explanation: The preterite form of 'traer' in third person plural is 'trajeron'.

questions.question: Translate to English: 'Ella condujo el carro'
questions.explanation: 'Condujo' is the preterite form of 'conducir' in third person singular.

questions.question: Translate to Spanish: 'You (formal) produced the movie'
questions.explanation: The preterite form of 'producir' in third person singular (formal you) is 'produjo'.

questions.question: Translate to Spanish: 'I danced at the party'
questions.explanation: The preterite form of 'bailar' in first person singular is 'bailé'.

questions.question: Translate to Spanish: 'You drank water'
questions.explanation: The preterite form of 'beber' in second person singular is 'bebiste'.

questions.question: Translate to English: 'Él vivió en Madrid'
questions.explanation: 'Vivió' is the preterite form of 'vivir' in third person singular.

questions.question: Translate to Spanish: 'You all were at home'
questions.explanation: The preterite form of 'estar' in second person plural is 'estuvisteis'.

questions.question: Translate to English: 'Tú tuviste razón'
questions.explanation: 'Tuviste' is the preterite form of 'tener' in second person singular.

questions.question: Translate to Spanish: 'They did their homework'
questions.explanation: The preterite form of 'hacer' in third person plural is 'hicieron'.

questions.question: Translate to English: 'Nosotros dimos un regalo'
questions.explanation: 'Dimos' is the preterite form of 'dar' in first person plural.

questions.question: Translate to Spanish: 'You (formal) saw the movie'
questions.explanation: The preterite form of 'ver' in third person singular (formal you) is 'vio'.

questions.question: Translate to English: 'Ellos quisieron ayudar'
questions.explanation: 'Quisieron' is the preterite form of 'querer' in third person plural.

questions.question: Translate to Spanish: 'I came to the meeting'
questions.explanation: The preterite form of 'venir' in first person singular is 'vine'.

questions.question: Translate to English: 'Tú pudiste terminar'
options: You will be able to finish
questions.explanation: 'Pudiste' is the preterite form of 'poder' in second person singular.

questions.question: Translate to Spanish: 'She put the keys on the table'
options: Pone las llaves en la mesa
Puso las llaves en la mesa
Ponía las llaves en la mesa
Pondrá las llaves en la mesa
questions.explanation: The preterite form of 'poner' in third person singular is 'puso'.

questions.question: Translate to English: 'Nosotros supimos la noticia'
questions.explanation: 'Supimos' is the preterite form of 'saber' in first person plural.

questions.question: Translate to Spanish: 'You all said the truth'
questions.explanation: The preterite form of 'decir' in second person plural is 'dijisteis'.

questions.question: Translate to English: 'Ella trajo el libro'
questions.explanation: 'Trajo' is the preterite form of 'traer' in third person singular.

questions.question: Translate to Spanish: 'We wrote a letter'
questions.explanation: The preterite form of 'escribir' in first person plural is 'escribimos'.

questions.question: Translate to English: 'Vosotros bailasteis bien'
questions.explanation: 'Bailasteis' is the preterite form of 'bailar' in second person plural.

questions.question: Translate to Spanish: 'They drank coffee'
questions.explanation: The preterite form of 'beber' in third person plural is 'bebieron'.

questions.question: Translate to English: 'Yo viví en Barcelona'
questions.explanation: 'Viví' is the preterite form of 'vivir' in first person singular.

questions.question: Translate to Spanish: 'You (formal) were right'
questions.explanation: The preterite form of 'tener' in third person singular (formal you) is 'tuvo'.
